participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: cheerful and creative, loves music and sports.
participant_1.background: i love chocolate bars. i play the violin and the guitar. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and introspective, passionate about animal rights.
participant_2.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today? i'm doing well.
